title: SUNWAY BHD : Others sunway berhad ("sunway") - revision to the principal terms and conditions of the commercial papers ("cp") and/or medium term notes ("mtn") pursuant to a cp/mtn programme of up to rm2.0 billion in nominal value by sunway berhad ("cp/mtn
content: OTHERS SUNWAY BERHAD ("SUNWAY") - REVISION TO THE PRINCIPAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE COMMERCIAL PAPERS ("CP") AND/OR MEDIUM TERM NOTES ("MTN") PURSUANT TO A CP/MTN PROGRAMME OF UP TO RM2.0 BILLION IN NOMINAL VALUE BY SUNWAY BERHAD ("CP/MTN PROGRAMME")
